comment: Patterson was a really cool guy and the class is really interesting. However Be prepared to present and work (3 articles, 1 franchise presentation, 1 group presentation, 2 Tests, and a Paper) All are extremely easy though. Really enjoyed this class it was a Easy A and this is coming from a B student. Do the work and you will be fine.
Great professor. The class is easy and pretty interesting. He really doesn't require much work and I found it to be a pretty easy A.
What a fantastic professor, seriously.  This is the only 4000-level management course I enjoyed going to.  A very fun and engaging course; you don't even realize you're learning.
GREAT PROFESSOR - very knowledgeable and helpful. The class was fun. I learned a lot and enjoyed it immensely. 2 tests, 3 articles, group presentation and individual franchise presentation. TAKE HIM

The course material was interesting enough. The time spent in class was enjoyable and the workload was fair.  The schedule on the syllabus was changed a lot throughout the semester due to rescheduling, so that messed with the consistency of knowing what was going on from week to week. He's good, just not totally clear. I got a decent grade.

He was very laid back.  Knew what he was talking about and had interesting stories to relate with material.  Attendance not always mandatory. Tests are very to the point and just like the study guides.  Put forth some effort and you'll be fine.  I did well on tests, but no feedback about presentation or final paper, and got a "B", not sure why.
Good teacher, easy class, teacher is really good. Follow the review for the two exams and do the presentations easy A or B if you put some effort into it.

For franchise His lectures were boring, he takes attendance everyday, or just passes around a sign-in sheet. 2 tests which were fill in the blank, short answer, essay but offers a thorough review guide:pretty easy if you stay on top of things. Each person must present 2 articles to class by end of semester and only one group project. Easy elective!

Good Prof but dry lectures.  Had him for franchise mgt, a subject I didnâ€™t really care for, but tests were easy.  He outlines everything that is going to be on the test.  There is a group project that requires a little presentation, not to time consuming.  He started the semester taking attendance, but rarely does so any more.  Very helpful and ope
